name: Interalia: Cerius II
overview: Date: Tuesday 27th August A.D. 6066 Location: The planet Cerius, many light years from Earth. Mission: The final destruction of Rogorf, Teriod and the Phibiatron guards. 1000 years have passed since the evil Rogorf was defeated, bringing peace to the people of Cerius. Now that peace is once again threatened .... Rogorf lives. Rebuilt by his alien counterpart, Teriod, he has returned with the aim of re-capturing the planet and enslaving the people. You have been selected to fly the "Avenger V9" spacecraft into Rogorf's domain and destroy him. Only then can you fly the ultimate mission to destry Teriod and bring peace to the planet forever.
